snippet: Tim Tebow played poorly and his numbers reflected it. Tony Romo's statistics looked fine, but looks can be deceiving.
abstract: Tim Tebow played poorly and his numbers reflected it. Tony Romo's statistics looked fine, but looks can be deceiving.
lead_paragraph: Anyone could see that Tim Tebow was having a bad day Sunday, and the numbers backed that up. He was 6 for 22 for 60 passing yards in a loss against Kansas City, and his rushing wasn't anything special (six carries for 16 yards).

headline.main: Statistical Lows for Romo and Tebow
